alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:02PM EDT until May 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hyde County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 601 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Ocracoke Ferry Terminal, or 17 miles northeast of Cedar Island, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portsmouth Village, Ocracoke Lighthouse and Ocracoke Ferry Terminal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
